summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 17062, entitled: "An Ordinance accepting a deed from James Black and Thos M. Warren to certain portions of lots One (1) and Sixteen (16), Block Eight (8), C. P. Stone's Extension to Edgewater Addition, for the purpose of extending North 39th Street, and appropriating money from the General Fund to pay for said property", approved September 27th, 1907.
